taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Occurs in river mainstream and low gradient tributaries with logs and leaf-litter on the bottom (Ref. 7050).  Feeds on insects and small fishes such as Rasbora spp. (Ref. 56749).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution

dataObjects.description: demersal; freshwater; pH range: 6.5 - 7.0; dH range: 5 - 8

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#TrophicStrategy
dataObjects.description: Known from river mainstream and low gradient tributaries with logs and leaf-litter on the bottom (Ref. 7050).
